 datname    |      mode                | granted | locks_count
------------+--------------------------+---------+-------------
 postgres   | AccessShareLock          | t       |           1
 postgres   | RowShareLock             | t       |           1
 postgres   | RowExclusiveLock         | t       |           1
 production | ShareUpdateExclusiveLock | t       |           1
 production | ShareLock                | t       |           1
